entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
